_header: That I eat and drink may have
_description: Gifts come back to God — two couplets translating a Latin distich Sunt mea si qua dedi…

BLAdd8151.Transcription:
þat I ete & þat I drynke þat may I haueþat I
                    loue fals mene long I may hit craueþat I dele for my soule þat
                    may I fyndeþat I lefe my sekatoures þat is long
                    byhynde
BLAdd8151.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Queene Elizabethes Achademy, etc.
EETS
         e.s. 8 (1869); repr. 1973: 85.

BLRoy17Bxvii.Transcription:
Þat I hete & þat drinke þat may I haueÞat I
                    leue fals men long I may hit…Þat I dele for my soule þat
                    may I fyndÞat I leeue my secatours þat is long
                    by…
BLRoy17Bxvii.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 1.364.
